Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the administrator mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "Administrator"
Click on the "File" menu and select "New Contextâ€¦"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "New Context" dialog box is being shown.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill the "Context name:" textfield with value "AdministratorTestContext"
Choose default context as parent context by leaving the "Use default context" selected in the "Parent Context" zone
Click on the "Next" button
Select "Use another location" choice
Click on the "Browse" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A file selector pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administator directory and click on the "OK" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The file selection disappears

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Finnish" button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "New context" dialog box is being hidden. A new context "AdministratorTestContext" has been created and is being show in the Context viewer. A "AdministratorTestContext" directory has been created in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "AdministratorTestContext" to unfold it

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context contains two categories: "Orchestra" and "Orchestra installation"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Orchestra" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The variable viewer displays five variables: "ArtefactPath", "ConfigurationDirectories", "ConfigurationDirectory", "SharedDirectory", "TemporaryDirectory"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContextToBeJoined" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContextToBeJoined" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Click on the "File" menu and select "Join a Contextâ€¦"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Join a context" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Browse" button to select the root directory of the parent context.

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A file selector pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select directory D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator and click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The file selector disappears. The "Contexts:" tree is showing that the "AdminContextToBeJoined" has been found in the D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator directory

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the "AdminContextToBeJoined" context by clicking on the checkbox next to it
Fill the "Context name:" textfield with "Participation to AdminContextToBeJoined"
Click on the "Finish" button.

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Join a context" dialog box disappears. The context "Participation to AdminContextToBeJoined" is displayed within the context viewer

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Participation to AdminContextToBeJoined" to unfold it

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The context contains two categories: "Orchestra" and "Orchestra installation"

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Orchestra" category

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The variable viewer displays five variables: "ArtefactPath", "ConfigurationDirectories", "ConfigurationDirectory", "SharedDirectory", "TemporaryDirectory"

TestCase.TestCase_Title: No more than one participation per context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContextToBeJoined" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContextToBeJoined" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer of the administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In user mode, create one participation to context "AdminContextToBeJoined" called "Participation to AdminContextToBeJoined"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to AdminContextToBeJoined" user context is displayed within the context viewer of the user

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Click on the "File" menu and select "Join a Contextâ€¦"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Join a context" dialog box pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Browse" button to select the root directory of the parent context.

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A file selector pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select directory D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator and click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The file selector disappears. The "AdminContextToBeJoined" context is not shown within the "Contexts:" tree

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Cannot inherit from a user context

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Create an administrator context called "AdminContextToBeJoined" and store it in D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "AdminContextToBeJoined" administrator context is displayed within the context viewer of the administrator

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: In user mode, create one participation to context "AdminContextToBeJoined" called "Participation to AdminContextToBeJoined"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The "Participation to AdminContextToBeJoined" user context is displayed within the context viewer of the user

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the user mode by clicking on the "Mode" menu and selecting "User"
Click on the "File" menu and select "Join a Contextâ€¦"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A "Join a context" dialog box pops up.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the "Browse" button to select the root directory of the parent context.

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A file selector pops up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select directory D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Administrator and click on "Ok"

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The file selector disappears. The "Participation to AdminiContextToBeJoind" context is not shown within the "Contexts:" tree.

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Open a File explorer
Create the base artefact directory D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts
Within the artefact directory, create the following directories : A1, B1 and B2
Within directory A1, create a Word file A1.doc
Within directory B1, create a Word file B1.doc
Within directory B1, create the following directories: B11 and B12
Within directory B11, create a Word file B11.doc
Within directory B12, create a Word file B12.doc
Within directory B2, create a Word file B2.doc
Within directory B2, create the following directories: B21
Within directory B21, create a Word file B21.doc
Launch the Orchestra Framework
Create a new admin context called 'AdminContext'
Add File System D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts to variable ArtefactPath
Add path to ConfdirOffice to variable ConfigurationDirectories
Save 'AdminContext' context
Right click on the 'AdminContext' and select 'set as current context' in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer shows 6 artefacts : A1/A1, B1/B1, B1/B11/B11, B1/B12/B12, B2/B2, B2/B21/B21

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Unfold the 'AdminContext' context
Click on the 'Orchestra' category
In the variable viewer, right click on the ArtefactPath variable and select 'Edit...' in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Editing overriding variable' dialog box is popped up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select the FS: [D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Artefacts] entry in the list
Click on the 'Setupâ€¦' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Choose directories to include' page is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Next >' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Choose filters to apply' page is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Add' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A new entry is created and selected in the list

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Set value '*/B1*' to the created entry and press Enter
Click on the 'Preview' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Fitlering preview tree has been updated

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Expand the Filtering preview tree

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: Both directories B1/B11 and B1/B12 cannot be found in the tree

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Finish' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Setting up an environment' dialog box disappeared

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Finish' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Editing overriding variable' dialog box disappeared

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Save the context by clicking on the save icon
Right click on the 'AdminContext' and select 'set as current context' in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The Orchestra Explorer shows 4 artefacts : A1/A1, B1/B1, B2/B2, B2/B21/B21

TestCase.TestCase_Title: Select a set of directories to include through wildcard

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Open a File explorer
Create the base directory D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3
Create directories : A, B, C, D
Copy ConfdirOffice, ConfdirOrchestraFramework and ConfdirMozart configuration directories to D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3
Copy ConfdirDOORS configuration directory to D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\B
Launch the Orchestra Framework
Create a new admin context called 'AdminContext'
Unfold the 'AdminContext' context
Click on the 'Orchestra' category
In the variable viewer, right click on the ConfigurationDirectories variable and select 'Edit...' in the contextual menu

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Editing overriding variable' dialog box is popped up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Add' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Setting up an environment' dialog box is popped up

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select 'File System' -> 'Directories on File System' in the environment tree
Click on the 'Next >' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Choose directories to include' page is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Add Manyâ€¦' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Select base directory for directory' directory selector is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Select directory 'D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir'
Click on the 'Ok' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The directory selector disappears. A 'Select directories to include' page is displayed

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill 'Filter:' textfield with '*'

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The '5.3' subdirectry has been selected in the preview tree

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill 'Filter:' textfield with '*/C*'

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following subdirectories have been selected and expanded in the preview tree : 5.3/C, 5.3/ConfdirOffice, 5.3/ConfdirOrchestraFramework and 5.3/ConfdirMozart

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Fill 'Filter:' textfield with '**/Conf*'

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The following subdirectories have been selected and expanded in the preview tree : 5.3/B/ConfdirDOORS, 5.3/ConfdirOffice, 5.3/ConfdirOrchestraFramework and 5.3/ConfdirMozart

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Finish' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: The 'Select directories to include' page disappears. In the 'Choose directories to include' page, the directory list containts the following directories : D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\B\ConfdirDOORS, D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\ConfdirMozart, D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\ConfdirOffice, D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\ConfdirOrchestraFramework

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Finish' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Setting up an environment' dialog box disappeared

Step_Description.Step_Description_label: Click on the 'Finish' button

Step_ExpectedResult.Step_ExpectedResult_label: A 'Editing overriding variable' dialog box disappeared. In the variable viewer, the ConfigurationDirectories variable contains 4 values : D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\B\ConfdirDOORS, D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\ConfdirMozart, D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\ConfdirOffice, D:\OrchestraFrameworkTests\Confdir\5.3\ConfdirOrchestraFramework
